title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 50, subpt. 50-2 - Access To Or Correction/amendment Of Records Of The Department Of Health Subject To The Personal Privacy Protection Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 50, subpt. 50-2 - Access To Or Correction/amendment Of Records Of The Department Of Health Subject To The Personal Privacy Protection Law

State Regulations
§ 50-2.1 - Statement of purpose
§ 50-2.2 - Definitions
§ 50-2.3 - Times, places for inspecting records and means for verifying the identity of a data subject
§ 50-2.4 - Persons from whom records may be obtained
§ 50-2.5 - Fees for copying records
§ 50-2.6 - Procedures governing inspection and copying of records
§ 50-2.7 - Appeals of denial of access to records
§ 50-2.8 - Procedures governing the correction or amendment of records
§ 50-2.9 - Appeals of denial of correction or amendment of records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 50, subpt. 50-2

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §206; Public

Officers Law, §94

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
